feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens and commas in a similar style, indicating consistency in punctuation usage.

feature2.explanation: There is similarity in lexical choices and sentence structures, suggesting a common authorship.

feature3.explanation: Both texts exhibit coherence and similar sentence lengths, contributing to the likelihood of the same author.

feature4.explanation: The narrative styles and tone show consistency, supporting the idea of the same author.

feature5.explanation: There were no significant spelling or typographical errors in either text, indicating a level of proficiency in writing.

overall.explanation: Considering the commonalities in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, narrative styles, and lack of spelling errors, there is a moderate to high confidence that the two texts were written by the same author.
